metadata.title: CVE-2014-9379 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The radius_get_attribute function in dissectors/ec_radius.c in Ettercap0.8.1 performs an incorrect cast, which allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code viaunspecified vectors, which triggers a stack-based buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: ettercap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
